name: HEX-IT
description:
Hi there !

NEW VERSION !!!! ( Better enemies + new cursor )

HEX-IT is my first ever game, but not the last ! 

HEX-IT is inspired of a famous game called : Hexagons. Such as this game you need to avoid touching some hexagons but I change it into a shooting game with waves of differents enemies.

I hope you'll enjoy it !
